headline: Lennox Increases Quarterly Dividend and Stock Repurchase Authorization
summary: The board of directors at Lennox (NYSE: LII), a leader in energy-efficient climate-control solutions, approved a 13% increase in the quarterly dividend from $1.15 to $1.30 per share of common stock, payable July 15, 2025, to stockholders of record as of June 30, 2025.
